locations.name: Elko Silver Mine
locations.locationDesc: Primary silver mining and processing facility
locations.locationLongDesc: Elko Silver Mine - Main silver ore mining and processing plant with crushing, grinding, and flotation circuits. Handles 2,000 tons per day of silver-bearing ore from local mines.

maintenancePlants.name: Elko Processing Facility
maintenancePlants.description: Primary silver processing and refining facility

maintenancePlants.name: Elko Equipment Center
maintenancePlants.description: Mining equipment maintenance and repair facility

locations.name: Reno Refinery
locations.locationLongDesc: Reno Refinery - Advanced silver refining and smelting facility processing concentrate from multiple mines. Produces 99.9% pure silver bars and specialty products.

locations.name: Winnemucca Mine
locations.locationLongDesc: Winnemucca Mine - Secondary silver mining operation with underground and surface mining capabilities. Processes 1,500 tons per day of silver ore.

locations.name: Phoenix Copper Complex
locations.locationDesc: Central copper processing and administration facility
locations.locationLongDesc: Phoenix Copper Complex - Headquarters facility housing copper processing operations, administrative offices, and central control systems. Processes 5,000 tons per day of copper concentrate.

maintenancePlants.name: Phoenix Central Plant
maintenancePlants.description: Central copper processing and administration facility

locations.name: Tucson Smelter
locations.locationDesc: Secondary copper processing and smelting facility
locations.locationLongDesc: Tucson Smelter - Secondary processing plant with smelting and refining capabilities. Handles copper concentrate from multiple mines and produces 99.9% pure copper cathodes.

maintenancePlants.name: Tucson Processing Center
maintenancePlants.description: Secondary copper processing and smelting facility

locations.name: Morenci Open Pit
locations.locationLongDesc: Morenci Open Pit - Large-scale open-pit copper mine, one of the largest in North America. Features 24/7 operations with extensive equipment fleet and processing facilities.

maintenancePlants.name: Morenci Maintenance Facility
maintenancePlants.description: Open-pit mine maintenance and operations center

locations.name: Fairbanks Gold Mine
locations.locationDesc: Arctic gold mining and processing facility
locations.locationLongDesc: Fairbanks Gold Mine - Specialized facility designed for extreme cold weather gold mining and processing. Features heated processing circuits and winterized equipment for year-round operation in sub-zero temperatures.

maintenancePlants.name: Fairbanks Arctic Plant
maintenancePlants.description: Arctic gold processing and extraction facility

locations.name: Nome Placer Operations
locations.locationDesc: Coastal placer gold mining and processing
locations.locationLongDesc: Nome Placer Operations - Coastal facility processing placer gold from beach and offshore deposits. Includes specialized dredging equipment and marine-grade processing systems.

maintenancePlants.name: Nome Gold Processing
maintenancePlants.description: Coastal gold processing and refining plant

locations.name: Juneau Operations
locations.locationLongDesc: Juneau Operations - Regional mining operations serving southeast Alaska. Provides marine transport logistics and specialized equipment for remote mining sites.

maintenancePlants.name: Juneau Equipment Center
maintenancePlants.description: Southeast Alaska equipment and logistics center

locations.name: Duluth Iron Works
locations.locationDesc: Iron ore processing and pelletizing facility
locations.locationLongDesc: Duluth Iron Works - Major iron ore processing facility with pelletizing plants and port facilities. Processes taconite ore into iron ore pellets for steel production, handling 25 million tons annually.

maintenancePlants.name: Duluth Iron Works
maintenancePlants.description: Iron ore processing and pelletizing facility

locations.name: Hibbing Mine
locations.locationDesc: Iron ore mining and primary processing center
locations.locationLongDesc: Hibbing Mine - Large-scale iron ore mining and primary processing facility. Features open-pit mining operations, crushing circuits, and rail loading facilities for ore transport.

maintenancePlants.name: Hibbing Processing Plant
maintenancePlants.description: Iron ore mining and primary processing center
